i live close to the coast.

my favorite food is hamburgers.

participant_2.background:
I do not have any kids, but I love to spend time with my nieces and nephews.
i like watching sports.
I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube.
i enjoy spending time with my family.
I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family.

content.text: Hello, what are you up to today?
Hi, I'm good! Just working through some homework.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about maybe going into fashion, but I'm not sure.
That's awesome! I'm a secret fashion designer myself.
No way! That's so cool! I'm not out to my family yet, but I'm hoping to one day.
I'm sure they'll be accepting of it. And if not, then you can always find a new family.
Thanks, I needed to hear that.
No problem! So, what are some of your favorite pieces that you've designed?
I really like the dress I designed for my sister's wedding. It was a simple design, but it was really elegant.
That sounds beautiful. I'm sure your sister loved it.
She did! She said it was the best dress she's ever worn.
